called specialized cells. A somatic or vegetal cell is any biological cell forming the
 
body of an organism; that is, in a multicellular organism, any cell other than a
 
gamete, germ cell, gametocyte or undifferentiated stem cell.
 
 
Question
 
7
 
 
Which of the following pairs of cells carry out the same
 
function?
 
 
Options
 
 
A) Check cell and red blood
 
cell
 
 
B) Spermatozoon and
 
ovum
 
 
C) Palisade cell and epidermal
 
cell
 
 
D) Root tip cell and guard
 
cell
 
 
The correct answer is
 
B.
 
 
Explanation
